Ivy Black Clutch - 4617:
Ivy presents this classy clutch that is ideal to carry while going to an evening party. This clutch has the trendy combination of black and white that gives it an amazing look. The highlight of this clutch is its front that boasts of zebra print while the back has a glossy black colour. This clutch from Ivy will add to your appearance once carried with a white dress.
